thumb]]: Edgbaston]], was the home of [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] and his brother [[Hilary Tolkien
column3: Hilary]] from [[1908]] to [[1909]]. They were let a room  by a Mrs. Faulkner. Duchess Road is behind the [[Birmingham Oratory]]. It was at this time that Tolkien first met [[Edith Tolkien
